text: ROSFELD TRIAL DAY 4: It's up to the jury now via @pittsburghpg

text: Toomey statement on national emergency: I hoped the president would choose to avoid unilateral action and work with Congress on a legislative solution to secure the border. My staff and I are reviewing the president’s declaration and its implications very closely.

text: “We find it incredibly hypocritical that the Post-Gazette would sponsor a forum on health-care disparities when it has chosen to illegally slash the health-care benefits of about 400 members of the Guild and other PG unions.” https://newpeoplenewspaper.com/2019/02/05/post-gazette-drama-continues-2/ … @PGNewsGuild
author: pgPoliTweets

text: Reporters in Statuary Hall who are waiting to interview lawmakers after #SOTU lean in to listen to a live feed as lawmakers sing Happy Birthday to Tree of Life survivor Judah Samet of #Pgh. He is 81 today.
author: pgPoliTweets

text: Trio of former presidential office-seekers are sitting in a row: Romney, Cruz and Paul. Should make for some interesting conversation.  #SOTU
author: pgPoliTweets

text: Sgt. Dylan Elchin funeral procession at Arlington National Cemetery
author: pgPoliTweets

text: The remains of Sgt. Dylan Elchin of Beaver County have just arrived by caisson at his gravesite at Arlington National Cemetery.
author: pgPoliTweets

text: Awaiting the arrival of Sgt. Dylan Elchin’s casket at the rain-soaked Arlington National Cemetery. Elchin, of Beaver County, was killed in the line of duty in Afghanistan in Nov.
author: pgPoliTweets

text: Curious: Has anyone ever seen a news report that reported someone did not get a standing ovation? Hmmm.
author: pgPoliTweets

text: Seeking Pennsylvania folks (other than government workers) who are affected by the shutdown. Please RT.
author: pgPoliTweets

text: Also there were no alien invasions tonight.
author: pgPoliTweets

text: This is a stretch but is anyone aware of any DC or Pittsburgh bars or gatherings where furloughed workers might be watching the president's prime-time address on the #shutdown tomorrow night? Pls RT
